name: Korean BBQ Ribs

ingredients.name: Korean BBQ Chicken & Ribs Sauce Mix
each ketchup, rice vinegar and soy sauce
racks bone-in spareribs, about 4 1/2 lb (2 kg)

preparation: In a bowl, whisk seasoning with soy sauce, rice vinegar and ketchup. Cut ribs into serving-size portions. Wrap in foil and place on Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner. Roast in preheated 350°F (180°C) oven for 1 1⁄2—2 hours.
Open foil and coat generously with sauce. Roast for an additional 20—25 minutes or finish on the BBQ over medium-high heat for 10—15 minutes.

products.name: Korean BBQ Chicken & Ribs Sauce Mix (3pk)
summary: Versatile BBQ sauce. Use on chicken, pork or beef.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!
